channel.title: How to on Open Terms Archive documentation
channel.description: Recent content in How to on Open Terms Archive documentation

item.title: Navigate history
item.description: How to navigate history Screencast ðŸ”— Learn how to navigate through versions history in this 4 minutes video, or scroll below for the textual version. Manual ðŸ”— Every collection offers a public database of versions they recorded. For this guide, we will use the example of the Demo collection. The terms of this collection are published on the OpenTermsArchive/demo-versions repository. From the repository page, open the folder of the service of your choice by clicking on it.

item.title: Publish a memo
item.description: How to publish a memo This guide will help you publish a memo on opentermsarchive.org/en/memos. No technical skills are required. Prerequisites ðŸ”— A drafted memo compliant with the copywriting reference. 1. Send ðŸ”— Send your memo to contact@opentermsarchive.org by writing it in the body of the email or as a file attachment. Feel free to add any comments or questions you may have about the content or format. 2. Review ðŸ”— The OpenÂ TermsÂ Archive core team will review your memo as quickly as possible.
